about_the_game:
Life turns around when you find out that you have woken up in a room that isn't yours.

Suddenly, to make things worse; Ciara Mori finds out that she has been trapped with a crazy, psycho, man who wants nothing but to gain enjoyment out of seeing others in pain. And if that's not enough, shortly after you find out that you are imprisoned with twelve other helpless people who want nothing but to get out and see their family again.

But that won't be happening! Not until he gets his enjoyment.

Or will you possibly find a way to escape this hell-room? It's up to you to learn about this mysterious place and pick up new clues on how you got there. New clues that could possibly lead to your escape... Mingle with other characters, gain relationships, friendships, and enjoy intimate moments with your chosen characters. But be careful, don't get too close to them... they might turn on you.

What To Expect:
- You play as Ciara Mori: a nine-teen year-old girl. Explore the areas you're trapped in, search for clues, mingle with characters and enjoy
the dark, twisted storyline that is bound to get you swept off your feet! Participate in various killing games, torture games and more, brought to you by the
cunning antagonist- Akira! Work on putting together clues from the story in order to find out the true reason on why you were brought here and enjoy the
beautiful, hand drawn art, with special intimate moments!

Gaining Relationships with Characters:
-Throughout the story, get closer to the one and only, Ash Ito. Enjoy intimate moments with him, choose different choices in order to strengthen your
relationship, help him through tough times and solve puzzles together! It may be a tough situation, but there's always time for a bit of romance ;).
With other characters, you get moments where you can speak to your favourite characters, help them, and get them to trust you.

Steam Features:
-Choose certain choices or actions to gain steam achievements!

content_descriptors.notes:
Game contains:

-Death/Killing/Torture
-Graphic images of deaths/killings
- Occasional crude language
-Sensitive topics (abuse, violence, bullying, disorders)
-Very emotional and disturbing scenes

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-12400 or better
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL or DirectX with at least 1GB of RAM
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

name: Trapped: Forced To Kill

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core Any Size
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any Graphics Card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

oflc.descriptors:
Strong language
Sensitive themes (abuse, death...)
Blood and gore

short_description: Stab... stab... stab... How much more killing and torture will this sadistic psychopath force upon others? And at what point will it finally come to an end?
